creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Mr and Mrs Fred Levin, The Shenson Foundation in memory of Dr Ben Shenson
description: male figure wearing black top and white pants riding a horse; farmer has white cap, grey facial hair, and wears a large round hat on his back; long tool balanced over PL shoulder; rock at LLC, wispy tree UL
markings: L center, square intaglio: [Myōdō no in]; L center, square intaglio: [Kinkoku]
medium: Ink and light colors on paper
title: Farmer on a Horse
